ygData.subject: Re: Bilge
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve heard that his placeholder is one of the aqua goblin shamans that wander the zone.....when I got him there was a low level group keeping the goblin camp
ygData.messageBody:
I've heard that his placeholder is one of the aqua goblin shamans that
wander the zone.....when I got him there was a low level group keeping the
goblin camp clear so me and a buddy just wandered the zone killing all
goblin shaman (Bilge is a shaman). 45 minutes later he spawned in the water
near the entrance to Dagnor's and swam towards the goblin camp. We got him
as he came out of the water and fed him a dirt nap..........

Dweezeman Dourbough
36th human cleric E'Ci

----- Original Message -----
From: Tom <imgargoyle@...>
To: EQ Clerics <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 27, 2000 11:12 PM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Bilge


> From: Tom <imgargoyle@...>
>
> Hello there fellow clerics. Just wanted to see if anyone here knows the
> general location where Bilge spawns in the cauldron and if there is a
> trick to get him to spawn other than killing every wandering goblin in
> sight. Somone told me he spawns on the island on the very top, but
> I have never seen the dirty critter yet.
>
> Exok Grimstone
> Gnomish cleric
> Veeshan server
>
